overview: Every year, 25,000 people die on Russian roads. You could say a whole city is disappearing from our planet. And about a third of its "residents" were involved in an accident due to speeding. Many drivers do not consider acceleration even at 30 km / h a violation, but statistics show that they are wrong.  Five different stories combined in movie almanacs will make every viewer, at least, think about the right choice of speed. Both on the road and in life.
title: There's No Hurry
